parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of row in which cell resides

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of column in which cell resides

title: ITableAnnotation.IsCellTextEditable
description: Gets whether the text in this cell can be edited.
signature:
System.Boolean IsCellTextEditable( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of row in which cell resides

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of column in which cell resides

returns: True if text in this cell can be edited, false if not
remarks:
The index for both rows and columns is 0-based.
Tables and cells:
BOM table annotation
: All cells can be edited.
General table annotation
: All cells can be edited.
Hole table annotation
: Only some columns can be edited because some information is automatically generated, thus, that information cannot be edited. The header row and custom columns can be edited.
Revision table annotation
: All cells can be edited.
